flawed_nl_solution:
After this week, Michelangelo will have 28-12=<<28-12=61>>61 more ceilings to paint.
Next week, Michelangelo will paint 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 ceilings.
Michelangelo will have 61-3=<<61-3=58>>58 more ceilings to paint.
#### 58

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 61. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
